prompt: With the media of your choosing, create a tree using the triad color scheme.
Create a piece of your favorite food using your three least favorite colors.
Pick a random song through your favorite playlist and look at the first line of the chorus. Sketch a representation of that particular line.
Cut out images from magazines, and create your own self-potrait.
Recreate a work by your favorite artist with the media of your choosing.
Create a piece inspired by your favorite Disney Princess.
Choose your least favorite song. Create an abstract painting (with the paints of your choice) by listening to the beats,rhythm, and vocals. Reflect on why and how you created what you created.
Create an illustration about your first time meeting a creature from outer space.
Use coffee or wine to create a piece about your bad habits.
